# Extreme Networks ExtremeXOS MLAG Configuration
# Multi-chassis LAG for Active-Active Redundancy

configure snmp sysname "exos-mlag-01"

# Create VLANs
create vlan "ISC" tag 4094
create vlan "Data" tag 100
create vlan "Voice" tag 200

# Configure ISC VLAN IP
configure vlan ISC ipaddress 10.255.255.1/30

# Create MLAG Peer
create mlag peer mlag-peer

# Configure MLAG Peer IP
configure mlag peer mlag-peer ipaddress 10.255.255.2 vr VR-Default

# Configure MLAG ISC VLAN
configure mlag peer mlag-peer vlan ISC

# Add LAG members to MLAG
configure vlan ISC add ports 1:49-1:50 tagged

# Create MLAG port groups
enable sharing 1:1 grouping 1:1 algorithm address-based L3_L4 lacp
create mlag port 1 peer mlag-peer id 1

enable sharing 1:2 grouping 1:2 algorithm address-based L3_L4 lacp
create mlag port 2 peer mlag-peer id 2

# Configure MLAG reload delay
configure mlag peer mlag-peer lacp-mac 00:00:5e:00:01:01
configure mlag peer mlag-peer reload-delay 60

# Enable MLAG peer
enable mlag peer mlag-peer
